name: Tour "Origins Of Flamenco"
description:
A visit to Spain would never be complete if you do not dive into one of the most genuine artistic expressions of Spain, Flamenco music. This musical style, universally known, has its roots in the depths of the Spanish soul, going back more than 2000 years.
Whether your interest is music history, Flamenco or enjoying interesting stories about Madrid, we´ve got you covered. During our Tour “Origins of Flamenco” you will discover all the keys to understand this musical style full of passion and emotion, which is, without doubt, one of the icons of Spanish culture. We will travel back in time to its origins into the deep Andalusía (South Spain) and discover how Flamenco reached Madrid, one of the epicenters of Flamenco music. In fact, a famous quote says: "Flamenco was born in Andalucía but it is performed in Madrid".
